tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    customer_id INT,
    merchant_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE outliers_identification (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_amount DECIMAL,
  transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
  transaction_type VARCHAR,
  customer_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE outliers_detection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(20),
    activity_date TIMESTAMP,
    activity_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE outliers_detection (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    data_type TEXT,
    data_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amount FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    anomaly_type TEXT,
    detected_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE outliers_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    customer_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL,
    customer_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE anomalies (
    anomaly_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    reason TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE fraudsters (
    fraudster_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    reason TEXT,
    action_taken VARCHAR(50)
)
